alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 20 at 3:54PM AKST until February 21 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Aleutians. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong low pressure system continues to lift out of the North Pacific and into the western Bering. Strong west-southwest winds are expected around 3 AM AKST for the cities of Adak and Atka. Conditions are expected to improve by Tuesday afternoon as the low lifts northward.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
